physical_appearance: "This coloured print captures three children in party hats. The girl to the right dons a white dress, paired with knee length socks and red strapped shoes. She holds a painting of Jesus in her hands. To her right, is a shorter girl in a blouse top and black bottom blowing a party blower. Lastly, to the girl's right, is a boy in a buttoned down shirt and white bottoms. Beneath the image is the caption ""Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year. Refugee camp
subject_terms_1: Singapore 1979"". " personal life events  families (kinship groups)
